kese ho me sambandhayen danata sidukerena parikshanayata adala warthawa nikuth kirimen pasu idiri piyawara ganimata sudanam bawath aapadawa gana ek ek parshawawalata chodana karamin “ballage wade buruwa karanna oona na” yana prakashayata anuwa kriya kala yuthu bawada ohu kiweya.
